attributes.action: Unify NHS Prescription charges across the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The NHS prescription charges across the UK should be unified to remove the anomoly whereby the cost of each item is £6.85 per item in England but free in Wales.National Insurance contributions across the UK are the same but this charge is a case of discriminating against the place where people live. One NHS - One set of charges.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
